
	-==-

Modified Subaction - Self Damage/Heal
- updated version of this code, with no static overwrites https://smashboards.com/threads/new-melee-syntax-school-you-can-write-character-commands-now.402587/#post-19190895
[Achilles]
Version -- DOL Offset ------ Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code
1.02 ----- 0x80072C14 --- 80840000 -> Branch

88A40001 A0840002
8063002C 2C050001
40820024 3CA08006
60A5CF5C 7CA803A6
4E800021 3CA08007
60A52C3C 7CA803A6
4E800020 3CA08007
60A52C24 7CA803A6
4E800020 48000000

3C808048 90A49D64
4200FFEC 901F0008
48000000




	-==-


Disable Tap Jump
- Uses Debug Menu flags to enable on a per player basis
- first code is disabling kneebend from tap jump
- second is disabling aerial jump checks for y-joystick
[Achilles]
Version -- DOL Offset ------ Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code
1.02 ----- 0x800cb4e0 --- 7C0802A6 -> Branch

3CA0803F 60A5A36C
80C3002C 88C6000C
1CC60004 7CC6282E
2C060001 40820010
2C040001 40820008
4E800020 7C0802A6
48000000


1.02 ----- 0x800cb984 --- 80ADAEB4 -> Branch

3C60803F 6063A36C
88BE000C 1CA50004
7C63282E 2C030001
40820018 80ADAEB4
3C60800C 6063B9AC
7C6903A6 4E800420
80ADAEB4 48000000

	-==-

- hold for two seconds
- only works in multiplayer mode
[Achilles]

1.02 ----- 0x80262614 --- BA6100B4 -> Branch

	-==-


Develop Mode - Disable Some Develop Toggles
Disables:
- Y+D-Pad Left = Super Mushroom Apply
- Y+D-Pad Right = Restore to default size (?)
- Y+A+D-Pad Left = Poison Mushroom Apply
- Y+A+D-Pad Right = ???? (function 800d237c)

- B+D-Pad Right (what does this do???)

- D-Pad Down (Item Spawn)

- A+Up and B+Up (what do these do???)

1.02 ----- 0x801A1C58 --- 800DB078 -> 38000000



	-==-


Normal C-Stick in Develop Mode (and 1P Mode kind of)
- Enables normal c-stick usage for CPUs and Humans in Develop Mode.
- Does not deal with disabling the C-stick camera functionality in 1P modes, which Zauron's code addresses.
[Achilles]
Version -- DOL Offset ------ Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code
1.02 ----- 0x8006ae00 --- 4080002C -> 48000010

1.02 ----- 0x8006ae98 --- 4080003C -> 48000010

	-==-


Custom Walljump Enable/Disable Flag
https://smashboards.com/threads/crazy-hand-v1-31-character-editing-program.389500/page-27#post-21391357
[Achilles]
Version -- DOL Offset ------ Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code
1.02 ----- 0x800816b8 --- 83E3002C -> Branch

83E3002C 3C608008
A0DF025A 2C060001
41820014 2C060002
40820018 60631918
48000008 606316C8
7C6803A6 4E800020
48000000

2C040000 41A20018

FC200090 FC010000
